casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE 606A05-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 6, 2016 Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Lane, Eric Glenn. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of September 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of September 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 12th day of October 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
